com.barchart.util.thread
Class ThreadInterruptibleIO

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.barchart.util.thread.ThreadInterruptibleIO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
@ThreadSafe
public class ThreadInterruptibleIO
extends Thread

use this thread implementation to enable InterruptedException - like behavior for IO methods that block on input/output but ignore Thread.interrupt() call; such as DatagramSocket.receive(), InputStream.read(), etc.; thread target must be of a supported type : ServerSocket, Socket, DatagramSocket, InputStream, OutputStream, Reader, Writer;

Nested Class Summary
 
Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread
Thread.State, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

          target must be of supported type
static void addTargetToCurrentThread(Object target)
          must be called from ThreadInterruptibleIO thread; target must be of supported type;
static ThreadFactory getFactory()
          executors must use this factory, so that tasks can add their interruptible IO targets;
 void interrupt()
          will clear interrupted targets from registration list after the interrupt event
 void removeTarget(Object target)
          note that interrupt event will auto clear all thread targets; call this if you want to disable target before the interrupt occurred
static void removeTargetFromCurrentThread(Object target)
          must be called from ThreadInterruptibleIO thread
